overview: From atop his precarious castle, a stingy dragon named Snudge sits and admires his gold. When an appetite comes calling, he spots an opportunity to nab a free pizza. If the pizzaman comes late, it's free. The dragon subjects the unsuspecting pizzaman named Marvin to an agonizing array of traps to delay him. But little did the dragon know, the pizzaman was more than ready to deliver. Antics ensue in an epic showdown until the two forces meet face to face. Will the dragon get his pizza for free, or will the pizzaman deliver on time?
title: Slice of Adventure
